title: AROMATHERAPY Balance - Cinnamon & Vanilla Hand cream 80ml - Beautyshopcy
description: Enrich your skin and indulge in the aroma of essential oils. Lavished with Avocado, Kawakawa & Coconut oils to soothe & restore moisture.
